thread.title: Another "Die Hard" film for Westchester's Bruce Willis?
thread.title_full: Another "Die Hard" film for Westchester's Bruce Willis?

title: Another "Die Hard" film for Westchester's Bruce Willis?
text:
Another "Die Hard" film for Westchester's Bruce Willis? The "Die Hard" franchise won't die easily. Post to Facebook Another "Die Hard" film for Westchester's Bruce Willis? The "Die Hard" franchise won't die easily. Check out this story on lohud.com: http://lohud.us/1RJUYBr Cancel Send A link has been sent to your friend's email address. Posted! A link has been posted to your Facebook feed. Join the Conversation 1 CONNECT TWEET LINKEDIN COMMENT EMAIL MORE 
The "Die Hard" franchise won't die easily. 
According to Deadline.com, Fox is in the early stages of developing a sixth installment of the action movie series starring Westchester resident Bruce Willis as tough New York City cop John McClane. There's buzz that the movie will be partly set in 1979, with another actor playing a young McLane and Willis, 60 , reprising his famous role in present-day scenes. 
The first "Die Hard" film was a blockbuster hit in 1988. "Die Hard 2" followed in 1990. Then there was "Die Hard with a Vengeance" (1995), "Live Free or Die Hard" (2007), and "A Good Day to Die Hard" (2013). 
Willis, who moved to Bedford with his wife and children last year, has not commented on the recent report. He has been preparing for his first Broadway role in the upcoming stage adaptation of Stephen King's "Misery." 
Photo: Getty
